short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ip Tools ,Offline Aes Encryption & Decryption ,Hash Tools

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You Can Encrypt & Decrypt Your Text (Simple) With AES Algorithm Or Use Ip CheckUp Tools Or Hash Your Text With Any SHA Algorithms.

Apart from IP detection, for security reasons all features are available offline and in a user's system without the need for internet.
